document.masterDocTitle: A review of the Cetoniinae (Coleoptera: Scarabaeidae) from Argentina and adjacent countries: systematics and geographic distributions

mods:titleInfo.mods:title: A review of the Cetoniinae (Coleoptera: Scarabaeidae) from Argentina and adjacent countries: systematics and geographic distributions

paragraph.treatmentCitationGroup:
Hoplopyga (= Gymnetis ) liturata (Olivier)
:
Hedström & Elmqvist 1984: 313–316
(distribution; natural history).

subSubSection.paragraph:
Distribution:
MEXICO
( Schenkling 1921 );
Veracruz
: Briones; Córdoba, Estación de Biología Los Tuxtlas ( Morón 1995 );
Yucatán
: Tigre Grande ( Reyes Novelo & Morón 2005 );
Quintana Roo
( Reyes Novelo & Morón 2005 );
Jalisco
: Casimiro Castillo, Arroyo Tacubaya ( Fierros-López 2007 );
Chiapas
: Comitán; Laguna Bélgica; Simojóvel (
Pacheco Flores et al. 2008
).
COSTA RICA
: Rio Sucio; Cache ( Morón 1995 ):
Guanacaste
: National Park of Santa Rosa ( Hedström & Elmqvist 1984 ).
GUATEMALA
:
Alta Verapaz
: San Juan Chamelco ( Orozco 2012 ); Cobán ( Morón 1995 , Orozco 2012 ); Verapaz ( Morón 1995 );
Guatemala
: Guatemala ( Orozco 2012 );
Quetzaltenango
: Zunil ( Morón 1995 , Orozco 2012 );
San Marcos
: La Conquista ( Orozco 2012 ); Zapote ( Morón 1995 , Orozco 2012 );
Suchitepéquez
: Finca Chocolá ( Orozco 2012 ).
NICARAGUA
: Chontales (Bates 1888, Morón 1995 ).
BELIZE
( Schenkling 1921 , Blackwelder 1944 , Reyes Novelo & Morón 2005 ).
PANAMA
: Bugaba; Chiriqui; David; Caldera ( Morón 1995 ).
COLOMBIA
:
Antioquia
: Betania, # 6688, J. Montoya leg., 1 ex. [MEFLG]
;
Gómez Plata, # 6688, J. Zuluaga leg., 1 ex. [MEFLG]
;
Guarne, # 8794, C.E. Giraldo leg., 1 ex. [MEFLG]
; Medellín, # 6688, F.L. Gallego leg., 3 exx. [MEFLG],
# 8794, F.L. Gallego leg., 1 ex. [MEFLG]
;
Prado, # 8794, E.M. Aguilar leg., 1 ex. [MEFLG]
;
Santafé de Antioquia, # 6688, A.E. Franco leg., 1 ex. [MEFLG]
; Turbo, # 6689, F.L. Gallego leg., 5 exx. [MEFLG] ; Villa Arteaga, # 6689, F.L. Gallego leg., 2 exx. [MEFLG] ;
Yolombó, # 8794, E. Gómez leg., 1 ex. [MEFLG] (
Neita Moreno et al. 2010
)
;
Córdoba
: Tres Palmas, # 6688, R. Vélez leg., 1 ex. [MEFLG] (
Neita Moreno et al. 2010
)
;
Valle del Cauca
: Palmira, # 2346, A. Madrigal leg., 5 exx. [MEFLG]
;
Toro, # 6688, Múnera y Mejía J.A. leg., 1 ex. [MEFLG] (
Neita Moreno et al. 2010
).
VENEZUELA
( Schenkling 1921 , Blackwelder 1944 ).
ECUADOR
( Gara & Onore 1989 ): Guayaquil; Durán; Posorja; Balzapampa [Campos Collection] ( Campos 1921 ).
BRAZIL
( Schenkling 1921 , Blackwelder 1944 );
Matto Grosso
: Chapada ( Gahan & Arrow 1904 ).
ARGENTINA
( Schenkling 1921 , Blackwelder 1944 ):
Chaco
: in the Bruch Collection ( Bruch 1911a ).

Minas Gerais

;

;

];

;
